title: "Alchemy" on 2004 AIGAsf Studio Tours poster
content:
Anyone know the font used on the 2004 AIGAsf Studio Tours poster?

thnx,  
t

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [alchemy1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202192710/http:/typophile.com/files/alchemy1.jpg) | 15.19 KB |
author: belonax

comments.content: Beautiful, and I would wager not a font.

Reminds me of [Tony and Caio de Marco](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202192710/http:/www.linotype.com/7-2180-7/tonyandcaiodemarco.html)'s [Samba Expert](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202192710/http:/www.linotype.com/92035/sambastdexpert-font.html).

Reminds me of the beautiful work of Marian Bantjes.

[http://www.quatrifolio.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202192710/http:/www.quatrifolio.com/ "http://www.quatrifolio.com/")  
 [http://www.bantjes.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202192710/http:/www.bantjes.com/ "http://www.bantjes.com/")
